Name.Description:
The name of the Amazon Kinesis stream. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical 
                  ID and uses that ID for the stream name. For more information, see 
                  Name Type.ImportantIf you specify a name, you cannot do updates that require this resource to be replaced.
You can still do updates that require no or some interruption. If you must replace the resource, specify a new name.

ShardCount.Description:
The number of shards that the stream uses. For greater provisioned throughput,
                  increase the number of shards.

Tags.Description:
An arbitrary set of tags (keyâ€“value pairs) to associate with the Amazon Kinesis
                  stream.

Arn.Description:
The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the Amazon Kinesis stream, such as
                     arn:aws:kinesis:us-east-1:123456789012:stream/mystream.
